title: Know your library. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Frustration of a girl who has not had elementary school library instruction before entering a large library. Close-ups of library equipment. Stresses library as a centre for materials other than books. Librarian offers help in using the card catalogue, finding books and using reference materials.
